description:
# Source
The data is extracted through Spotify API directly. For a comprehensive overview of the data extraction process, you can check out the notebook [here](https://www.kaggle.com/code/josephinelsy/spotify-top-hit-2010-2022/).

# Content
The dataset includes information on songs/tracks (100 per year) from Top Hit playlists from 2010 to 2022 created by Spotify.
- 2300 attributes
- 23 variables
  - 2 playlist related (playlist_url, year)
  - 3 [track](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api/reference/get-track) related (track_id, track_name, track_popularity)
  - 13 track's[ audio features](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api/reference/get-audio-features) (danceability, energy, key, loudness, mode, speechiness, acousticness, instrumentalness, liveness, valence, tempo, duration_ms, time_signature)
  - 1 album related (album)
  - 4 [artist](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api/reference/get-an-artist) related (artist_id, artist_name, artist_genre, artist_popularity)

# Usage/Inspiration
- Factors affect the popularity of a song (e.g. danceability, artist popularity)
- Trends and preferences in popular songs (e.g. songs with less duration become more popular)
title: Spotify Top Hit Playlist (2010-2022)
